AdWeek

Here’s How Messaging Is Positioned to Dominate in 2019

January 3, 2019

72 trillion messages were sent across messaging platforms in 2018. In 2019, brands who are not capitalizing on messaging are missing out in the channel where people are not only sharing the most, but also where people are using their most authentic voice to communicate with their closest friends and family.
